insights.title: Demographic Insights
insights.genderBalance: The demographic analysis for {{year}} reveals a workforce predominantly composed of male employees ({{percentage}}% of the total workforce).
insights.ageDistribution: The age distribution indicates that the majority of employees are in the {{ageGroup}} age range, suggesting a {{workforce}} workforce.
insights.genderImbalance: There {{severity}} gender imbalances across age groups, with female representation being particularly {{level}}.

tenure.title: Tenure Analysis
tenure.subtitle: Analysis of employee tenure and seniority for {{year}}

metrics.averageTenureDesc: Average time employees have been with the company
metrics.newEmployeesDesc: Employees with less than 5 years of tenure
metrics.longTermEmployeesDesc: Employees with more than 10 years of tenure

insights.title: Tenure Insights
insights.overview: The tenure analysis for {{year}} shows an average tenure of {{avgTenure}} years across all employees.
insights.distribution: {{newPercentage}}% of employees have been with the company for less than 5 years, while {{longTermPercentage}}% have been with the company for more than 10 years.
insights.commonRange: The most common tenure range is {{range}}, representing {{count}} employees ({{percentage}}% of the workforce).

stability.high: This suggests a stable workforce with high retention rates.
stability.balanced: This suggests a balanced mix of experienced and newer employees.
stability.low: This suggests a relatively new workforce or potential retention challenges.

metrics.renewalRateDesc: New hires as % of total workforce

insights.title: Recruitment Insights
insights.overview: In {{year}}, the organization hired {{newHires}} new employees, representing a {{renewalRate}}% renewal rate of the workforce.
insights.topPosition: The most actively recruited position was {{position}}, with {{count}} new hires.
insights.diversity: Recruitment was spread across {{count}} different positions, indicating {{strategy}}.
insights.noHires: There were no new hires recorded for {{year}}.
insights.trendIncrease: Hiring increased compared to the previous year ({{previousCount}} hires).
insights.trendDecrease: Hiring decreased compared to the previous year ({{previousCount}} hires).
insights.trendStable: Hiring remained stable compared to the previous year ({{previousCount}} hires).

insights.title: Year-over-Year Insights
insights.headcountChange: From {{startYear}} to {{endYear}}, the organization's headcount {{trend}} by {{percentage}}%.
insights.ageAndTenure: The average age of employees has {{ageTrend}}, while the average tenure has {{tenureTrend}}.
insights.recruitmentIncreased: recruitment has increased over the years
insights.recruitmentDecreased: recruitment has decreased over the years
insights.shiftedFemale: has shifted towards more female representation
insights.shiftedMale: has shifted towards more male representation

insights.title: Risk Insights
insights.overview: The risk analysis for {{year}} identifies {{criticalCount}} high-risk positions requiring immediate attention.
insights.retirementRisk: {{count}} employees are near retirement, representing {{percentage}}% of the total workforce.
insights.criticalPositions: The most critical positions are {{positions}}, primarily due to {{reasons}}.
insights.recruitmentNeeds: Immediate recruitment needs have been identified for {{positions}}, with {{count}} positions to fill.
